00042 void Queen::DoExtraUpdates(float fTime)
00043 {
00044         // make queen parallel to the XZ plane
00045         NxMat33 rotation = m_spAgent->GetActor()->getGlobalOrientation();
00046         rotation.setColumn(1, NxVec3(0.0, 1.0, 0.0));
00047         m_spAgent->GetActor()->setGlobalOrientation(rotation);
00048 
00049         // if the current target move out of the queen's radius then
00050         // stop targeting it
00051         if (m_spCurrentTarget)
00052         {
00053                 NxVec3 distance = m_spCurrentTarget->GetAgent()->GetActor()->getGlobalPosition() - 
00054                         m_spAgent->GetActor()->getGlobalPosition();
00055                 if (distance.magnitude() > m_fcQueenViewRadius)
00056                 {
00057                         m_spCurrentTarget->SetEmmitance(NiColor(0.0, 0.0, 0.0));
00058                         m_spCurrentTarget = 0;
00059                 }
00060         }
00061         
00062 }

00070 bool Queen::DoExtraInits()
00071 {
00072         if (!GameCharacter::DoExtraInits())
00073         {
00074                 return false;
00075         }
00076 
00077         return true;
00078 }

00085 {
00086         m_spAgent->GetActor()->addLocalForce(
00087                 NxVec3(ConfigurationManager::Get()->queen_speedGain, 0.0, 0.0));
00088 }

00127 void Queen::Rotate(float dx, float dy)
00128 {
00129         float rotationGain = ConfigurationManager::Get()->queen_rotationGain;
00130         float moveUpSpeedGain = ConfigurationManager::Get()->queen_moveUpSpeedGain;
00131         m_spAgent->GetActor()->addLocalTorque(NxVec3(0.0, -dx*rotationGain,0.0));
00132         m_spAgent->GetActor()->addLocalForce(NxVec3(0.0, -dy*moveUpSpeedGain, 0.0));
00133 }

00151 void Queen::CycleTarget(const NiTPointerList<GameCharacterPtr>& enemies)
00152 {
00153         if (enemies.IsEmpty()) return;
00154 
00155         // if a target exists then get the next target
00156         if (m_itCurrentTargetPosition)
00157         {
00158                 if (enemies.Get(m_itCurrentTargetPosition))
00159                 {
00160                         if (m_itCurrentTargetPosition == enemies.GetTailPos())
00161                         {
00162                                 m_itCurrentTargetPosition = enemies.GetHeadPos();
00163                         }
00164                         else
00165                         {
00166                                 m_itCurrentTargetPosition = 
00167                                         enemies.GetNextPos(m_itCurrentTargetPosition);
00168                         }
00169                 }
00170                 else
00171                 {
00172                         m_itCurrentTargetPosition = enemies.GetHeadPos();
00173                 }
00174         }
00175         // a target does not exist so get the first enemy
00176         else
00177         {
00178                 m_itCurrentTargetPosition = enemies.GetHeadPos();
00179         }
00180 
00181         // deselect current target
00182         if (m_spCurrentTarget)
00183         {
00184                 m_spCurrentTarget->SetEmmitance(NiColor(0.0, 0.0, 0.0));
00185                 m_spCurrentTarget = 0;
00186         }
00187 
00188         // check if target is in radius otherwise select the next one
00189         while(true)
00190         {
00191                 m_spCurrentTarget = enemies.Get(m_itCurrentTargetPosition);
00192                 NxVec3 distance = m_spCurrentTarget->GetAgent()->
00193                         GetActor()->getGlobalPosition() - 
00194                         m_spAgent->GetActor()->getGlobalPosition();
00195                 if (distance.magnitude() <= m_fcQueenViewRadius)
00196                 {
00197                         break;
00198                 }
00199                 else
00200                 {
00201                         if (m_itCurrentTargetPosition == enemies.GetTailPos())
00202                         {
00203                                 break;
00204                         }
00205                         else
00206                         {
00207                                 m_itCurrentTargetPosition = enemies.GetNextPos(
00208                                         m_itCurrentTargetPosition);
00209                         }
00210                 }
00211         }
00212 
00213         // select target (change emmisive color)
00214         if (m_spCurrentTarget)
00215         {
00216                 m_spCurrentTarget->SetEmmitance(NiColor(1.0, 0.0, 0.0));
00217         }
00218 
00219 }
00220 //------------------------------------------------------------------------ 
00226 void Queen::SelectMoreSoldiers()
00227 {
00228         // get the target's position
00229         NxVec3 target;
00230         if (m_spCurrentTarget)
00231         {
00232                 m_fSelectionTimer += GameManager::Get()->GetDeltaTime();
00233                 if (m_fSelectionTimer < ConfigurationManager::Get()->timer_selectSoldiers)
00234                         return;
00235                 target = m_spCurrentTarget->GetAgent()->GetActor()->getGlobalPosition();
00236                 m_fSelectionTimer = 0.0f;
00237         }
00238         else
00239         {
00240                 return;
00241         }
00242 
00243         // find the soldier that is closest to that target
00244         BeePtr selected = FindSoldierClosestTo(target);
00245         // add the soldier to the selected soldiers list
00246         if (selected)
00247         {
00248                 selected->SetEmmitance(NiColor(0.0, 0.8, 0.0));
00249                 m_lSelectedSoldiers.AddTail(selected);
00250                 m_lSoldiers.Remove(selected);
00251         }
00252 }
00253 //------------------------------------------------------------------------ 
00258 void Queen::StopSelectingSoldiers()
00259 {
00260         // get the target's position
00261         NxVec3 target;
00262         if (m_spCurrentTarget)
00263         {
00264                 target = m_spCurrentTarget->GetAgent()->GetActor()->getGlobalPosition();
00265         }
00266         // a target no longer exists so deselct soldiers
00267         else
00268         {
00269                 NiTListIterator it = m_lSelectedSoldiers.GetHeadPos();
00270                 for (int i=0; i<m_lSelectedSoldiers.GetSize(); i++)
00271                 {
00272                         BeePtr soldier = m_lSelectedSoldiers.Get(it);
00273                         soldier->SetEmmitance(NiColor(0.0, 0.0, 0.0));
00274                         soldier->SetTarget(this);
00275                         m_lSoldiers.AddTail(soldier);
00276                         it = m_lSelectedSoldiers.GetNextPos(it);
00277                 }
00278                 m_lSelectedSoldiers.RemoveAll();
00279                 return;
00280         }
00281 
00282         // send all soldiers to the target
00283         NiTListIterator it = m_lSelectedSoldiers.GetHeadPos();
00284         
00285         for (int i=0; i<m_lSelectedSoldiers.GetSize(); i++)
00286         {
00287                 BeePtr soldier = m_lSelectedSoldiers.Get(it);
00288                 soldier->SetEmmitance(NiColor(0.0, 0.0, 0.0));
00289                 soldier->SetTarget(m_spCurrentTarget);
00290                 it = m_lSelectedSoldiers.GetNextPos(it);
00291         }
00292         m_lSelectedSoldiers.RemoveAll();
00293         m_fSelectionTimer = ConfigurationManager::Get()->timer_selectSoldiers;
00294 }
00295 //------------------------------------------------------------------------ 
00304 BeePtr Queen::FindSoldierClosestTo (const NxVec3& target)
00305 {
00306         // find min distance
00307         int size = m_lSoldiers.GetSize();
00308         NiTListIterator it = m_lSoldiers.GetHeadPos();
00309         NxVec3 distance;
00310         float minDistance = 5000000000.0f;
00311         BeePtr closestSoldier = 0;
00312         for (int i=0; i<size; i++)
00313         {
00314                 BeePtr soldier = m_lSoldiers.Get(it);
00315                 distance = target - soldier->GetAgent()->GetActor()->getGlobalPosition();
00316                 float mag = distance.magnitude();
00317                 if (mag < minDistance)
00318                 {
00319                         minDistance = mag;
00320                         closestSoldier = soldier;
00321                 }
00322                 it = m_lSoldiers.GetNextPos(it);
00323                                    
00324         }
00325 
00326         return closestSoldier;
00327 
00328 }

00400 void Queen::SortSoldiers(const NxVec3& target, NiTPointerList<CharacterDistancePairPtr>& sorted)
00401 {
00402         NiTListIterator it = m_lSoldiers.GetHeadPos();
00403         NiTPointerList<CharacterDistancePairPtr> distances;
00404         
00405         while (true)
00406         {
00407                 BeePtr soldier = m_lSoldiers.Get(it);
00408                 NxVec3 distance = target - soldier->GetAgent()->GetActor()->getGlobalPosition();

00413                         break;
00414                 }

00416                 {
00417                         it = m_lSoldiers.GetNextPos(it);
00418                 }

00422         distances.RemoveAll();

00424 //------------------------------------------------------------------------
00425 void Queen::SendSoldiers(const NxVec3& target, NiTPointerList<CharacterDistancePairPtr>& sorted)
00426 {
00427         NiTListIterator it = sorted.GetHeadPos();
00428         int size = sorted.GetSize();
00429         for (int i=0; i<size; i++)
00430         {
00431                 BeePtr soldier = (Bee*)(GameCharacter*)sorted.Get(it)->character;
00432                 soldier->SetTarget(target);
00433                 m_lSoldiers.Remove(soldier);
00434                 sorted.RemovePos(it);
00435         }
00436 }

00438 void Queen::SelectSoldiersClosestTo (const NxVec3& target, unsigned int count)
00439 {
00440         if (m_lSoldiers.GetSize() == 1)
00441         {
00442                 m_lSoldiers.GetHead()->SetTarget(target);
